One of the remaining two elements is the sum of these special numbers, and the other is an outlier.\n        int ans = INT_MIN;\n        int sum = 0;\n        unordered_map<int, int> freq;\n        for(auto num: nums) {\n            sum += num;\n            freq[num*2]++;\n        }\n        for(auto num: nums) {\n            int t = sum - num;\n            if(freq[t]>=2 || freq[t]==1 && (t!=num*2))\n                ans = max(ans, num);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"identify-the-largest-outlier-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
